Module ing.sw.puddu.rios.rizzo
Package it.polimi.ingsw.observation

Class FeedObservable

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.observation.Observable<FeedObserver>
      • it.polimi.ingsw.observation.FeedObservable
  • public class FeedObservable
extends Observable<FeedObserver>
    The observable class for the feed, which is the connection point from which the model delivers updates to the views
